General.Name: Ebiquity Plc
General.Description: Ebiquity plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides media consultancy and investment analysis services worldwide. The company operates through two segments, Media and Analytics & Tech. It offers analysis and advisory services in the areas of media management, media performance, marketing effectiveness, technology advisory, and contract compliance services. The company was formerly known as Thomson Intermedia Plc. Ebiquity plc was founded in 1997 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Chapter House, London, United Kingdom, N1 6DZ
